text:
@SecPompeo The Chinese virus kills, bankrapts & AFFECTS the mind. 
It makes the body heavy and unbearable, oppressed and hopes for change. Countries who were badly hit of COVID-19 may experience #protestoftheconfined because their mind was kept in global fear. China may know & was ready.
